reviews.text: stayed here for 2 weeks . location is excellent, right in front of a great beach, the hotel is in the los boliches area its about 20 minutes walk into fuengirola. hotel is clean rooms are decent size , we stayed in a 1 bedroom apartment for 4 people. nice pool, helpful reception. air con tv and safe deposit boxes available at small cost. hotel is nothing exceptional but also nothing to complain about. would stay here again .
reviews.title: great location

reviews.text: Have stopped at the ronda 4 4 times now and what a great hotel. We stayed in July this year and had another great time, the hotel is clean and friendly and in a great location for the beach. Highly recommend
reviews.title: A great place to stay

reviews.text: We stayed here July 2012 and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. However, we were a bit concerned about how dated it was and the fact that they didn't clean our room or change towels until I chased them after four days. This year, they were far more hands on and whilst it wasn't a thorough clean every day, they cleaned the room 6 times and changed the towels three times within our 14 day stay. Emptying the bins each time and leaving plenty of toilet roll. The pool bar was in full swing this year and they have added new tables and chairs to the pool and bar area. As always the girls on reception were great and we enjoyed it even more this year. The sofa bed was fine for our twelve year old, but if there is a group of you, you might want to try and get a bigger room with more beds for comfort. All in all a great budget stay. We'd definitely come again next year.
reviews.title: Even better the second time!

reviews.text: First time at Rhonda 4 and was worried that there wasn't enough shops/restaurants etc as its
reviews.title: ELAINE N.I. JULY 2013

reviews.text: just outside main town, no issues plenty of both. About half hour walk into main town but the bus stop is behind hotel and goes every half hour for one euro 10 cents, although it stops about 50 times on the way there! It will also bring you directly to the large shopping centre Myrmar which has a huge supermarket/restaurants/cinema/cloths shops etc. The sun doesn't start to hit the pool until about 12 and is fully covered by half one, but there is a roof terrace for probably adults if you fancy the sun earlier.
reviews.title: A Hot Week in Fuengirola.

reviews.text: Just returned from 11 nights at Ronda 4 and couldn't really fault the place. The building is right across the street from the beach and there are supermarkets in very close proximity. There are plenty of shops, cafes and restaurants to choose from. We were lucky staying in a 2 bedroomed apartment (Room 717) which was on the top floor facing the beach and it had a front and side facing corner balcony affording great views of the resort. The apartment was spotless and very spacious. A large lounge/diner, separate well equipped kitchen, and a small corridor off the lounge leading to a single bedroom, a double bedroom and a large 4 piece suite bathroom. Only downside was that there was no hairdryer, but we managed to buy a cheap travel hairdryer from a shop nearby for 8 euros. The air con and TV were free of charge, bonus. A 20 euro deposit was required for the remotes but that was refunded at the end of our stay.
reviews.title: Beautiful apartments
Simply the best!
reviews.text: The staff on reception were pleasant and very helpful and you can book trips there too. The main centre of Fuengirola and the marina is about a 20 - 30 minute walk away but it is a very pleasant walk along the promenade. Los Boliches area is a little quieter but still plenty of people/families milling about until at least midnight with various street entertainers about.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool area is very clean, though we didn't manage to get a sunbed but that was because we didn't go to the pool until mid afternoon but were able to lay our towels on the grassy area, no problem. There are plenty of comfy sunbeds on the beach at 4 euros each for the day,
reviews.title: Impressed - Great Location

reviews.text: We had a great time here and didn't want to come home!
reviews.title: A quiet hotel, by the beach, perfect for families

reviews.text: Great resort, great apartments, in fact, the apartments are the best we have ever stayed in over the last 12 years and I would certainly go back. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Good stay

reviews.text: All in all we had a great time. The majority of staff were super helpful and friendly, very good interaction with my two year old daughter. The room we stopped in (410) was a great size, people have moaned previously on here about the kettle but to be totally honest its slower yes than a plug in but its really not that bad. Yes the room didnt get cleaned as often as we were told at reception but it didnt faze us that much not having our bed made every day.
reviews.title: Good location, great sized rooms

reviews.text: Also the rooms have brilliant curtains, totally blackout! Brilliant for us :)
reviews.title: Clean spacious apartments in a fantastic location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What i would mention is that all rooms in this hotel are smoking rooms, and as non smokers we found our room smelt terribly and this really put a downer on spending time on it. We couldn't unpack our clothes as the ones we did leave out then also smelt of smoke. It was mentioned to reception and they offered to get the cleaners to air freshen the room but it didn't help any and this would stop us going there again in the future unfortunately.
reviews.title: Ronda 4 again!

reviews.text: The pools were also extremely cold so we only spent 5 minutes in them, which was a shame as they had great facilities!
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The shop attached to the hotel is extremely friendly, helpful and speak really good english.
reviews.title: another good holiday

reviews.text: This will be my third time at ronda 4 fantastic will be returning in october and then again nex summer excellent value for money great location anybody having any doubts get rid of them cant fault a thing about them give them s try
reviews.title: ronda 4
